text: The X Los Lagos Region () is one of the fifteen regions of Chile. It has four provinces. The capital city of the region is Puerto Montt. Other towns are Puerto Varas, Ancud and Frutillar. == Provinces of the region == * Province of Llanquihue: capital Puerto Montt. * Province of Chiloé: capital Castro. * Province of Osorno: capital Osorno. * Province of Palena: capital Chaitén == Related pages == * Chiloé Island
title: Los Lagos Region
